column2: Snoopy, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I was prescribed with this medication and I have liver disease have since found out this med. is a no-no in this situation. Patients need to be aware.  I ended up with severe fluid retention and bloody stools.

column2: jubreu, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: My iron levels are up, I'm feeling better.  Easey to take but have to add a stool softener.  My only complaint is that I have gained 15 pounds because it makes me hungry all the time.

column9: I've taken two pills so far and am experiencing pretty severe pain in my lower abdomen. I will be calling my dr. to ask what can be done about it.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Been taking this medicine for 5 days and so far no problems. No constipation yet.

I have been having problems keeping this medicine down.  I just began taking it a few days ago, and have consistently vomited within 45 minutes of having taken the drug. This may just be my body getting used to the drug. I have consulted my physician to see if there are any alternative drugs that I can take.
iron was up in 2 weeks, no stomach upset.
